revised_title: The Coexistence of a Reptilian-like Gastrula and a Mammalian Primitive Streak in Ornithorhynchus
tldr: The authors discover a reptilian-like gastrula and a separate mammalian primitive streak in an Ornithorhynchus egg, providing insight into the early stages of monotreme development and the similarities and differences between reptilian and mammalian embryonic development.
